game_description: Enjoy Youtube integrated rhythm game built around community levels, with: 1. Photorealistic environment 2. mainstream music • Browse & play countless levels built by the community directly within the game through a giant Youtube player • Move to the beat by shattering walls, following waves, slashing notes & avoiding fireballs What features I'm building next ? • Leaderboards • Multiplayer ! Wanna make your own levels, suggest ideas, provide feedback, or get help ? Join me on Discord: https://discord.gg/MEcbBRAfNk Note: the game is not affiliated with Youtube, but simply uses an in-game Youtube player
review_1: I love this game honestly but you need more songs on there cuz most of those songs are kind of boring to do you need more fast-paced songs
review_2: My bad! My initial review was that the it was impossible to avoid the glass walls, you actually need to punch them! It's alot of fun. Some feedback. 1. There is some.slowdown/slow framerate on the game especially when hitting the walls. 2. Make it so you need to hit the targets not just stick your arms out much better for a workout! Give more points for hitting targets but also space them out so you can hit them. Lovely background as well! Keep up the great work!!
review_3: I really hope you enjoy the game if you need any help or wanna provide feedback, join me on Discord: https://discord.gg/MEcbBRAfNk Thanks ^_^
